room_title: Escape room "Dr. Office" by Horror Escapes LA in Los Angeles
review: What a great experience for our first escape room! I would definitely recommend going, especially the Doctor's Office room!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Office" by Horror Escapes LA in Los Angeles
review: It was our first time going. My fiance and I enjoyed ourselves, it was so amazing. Excited to go back again

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Office" by Horror Escapes LA in Los Angeles
review: It was just my friend and me in the Dr. Office. It was challenging but definitely fun! We almost made it out too. It had a great spooky vibe. Thank you again to the people who were working there today - ya'll were super accommodating. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Office" by Horror Escapes LA in Los Angeles
review: Wow! We had a blast. This was my 2nd Escape Room ever and our group loved it. It was very immersive and creepy. We did the Doctors Room and made it out with just seconds to spare. Our game master was so sweet and I will definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Office" by Horror Escapes LA in Los Angeles
review: Just did the Doctor's Office and it was such an amazing experience! Great customer service, the story and the entire experience were amazing. This is by far the best escape room I have done yet, it literally has your blood pumping the entire time. Rachel the gamemaster was great. Def will be recommending this to all of my friends and family!
